casebody.data:
BTS, USA, INC.
v.
EXECUTIVE PERSPECTIVES, LLC, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2016

James T. Baldwin, in support of the petition.

Joseph D. Garrison, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 474, 142 A.3d 342 (2016), is denied.
